additions_other: Occasionally I will add collagen powder if I made instant coffee
pourover - black. Kcups at work - sweet cream creamer
I add just the tiniest amount of sugar and milk
about a half a teaspoon of sugar and a tablespoon of milk at the most.
I drink black coffee on weekdays to keep my morning routine simpler
but on the weekends I like to experiment with milk and homemade syrups.
Half&Half or a few drips of cream... need that milkfat
Occasionally black with a tsp of genuine maple syrup
For pour over use spicy chocolate
I enjoy supplements in my coffee: a turmeric reishi ashwaganda blend
Just black or with Choc and Sweetened condensed milk
if it's not a good brew
I'll add a splash of oat milk and a little bit of honey
